flawed_nl_solution:

He gets 2*2=<<2*2=4>>4 points per minute from the two-point shots
So he scores 4+3=<<4+3=4>>4 points per minute
There are 24/4=<<24/4=6>>6 intervals
So he scores 4*6=<<4*6=24>>24 points
